example.en: For centuries people have enjoyed eating the mussels’ delicate, nutritious meat in a variety of ways.
example.vi: Hàng thế kỷ qua, người ta đã thích thú thưởng thức món thịt trai ngon, giàu dinh dưỡng theo nhiều cách khác nhau.

example.en: The human body is a very delicate machine.

example.en: This exquisitely fine lamp can indeed be considered delicate.

example.en: I was gonna put it a little more delicately than that, but yeah.

example.en: How would Abraham deal with this delicate situation?

example.en: In India only delicate men are good dancers.

example.en: A delicate flower to be pressed between walls of stone.

example.en: Behind us the clouds were bathed in a delicate blush, golden light surrounding them.
example.vi: Phía sau chúng tôi, những đám mây đang đắm chìm trong ánh hồng phơn phớt, ánh sáng vàng bao quanh các đám mây.

example.en: At the trial, her face looked so delicate, so helpless.
example.vi: Trước phiên tòa, gương mặt bả trông rất thanh tú, rất tuyệt vọng.

example.en: are the lightest things, the most delicate things.

example.en: For you will not experience again that people call you delicate and dainty.”
example.vi: Vì từ nay về sau, ngươi sẽ không được xưng là dịu-dàng yểu-điệu nữa đâu”.
